description.component: The universal implementation of a Hero Slider to be used on the homepage in most cases. A rich hero slider that allows you to display video and/or image slides.

attributes.name: Attributes
attributes.description: HTML attributes for the containing element.

css_name.name: CSS name
css_name.description: A css-safe version of the view name.

css_class.name: CSS Class
css_class.description: The user-specified classes names, if any.

rows.name: Rows
rows.description: HTML attributes for the containing element.

empty.name: Empty
empty.description: The content to display if there are no rows.

title.name: Title
title.description: Title of the view, only used when displaying in the admin preview.

title_prefix.name: Title Prefix
title_prefix.description: Additional output populated by modules, intended to be displayed in front of the main title tag that appears in the template.

title_suffix.name: Title Suffix
title_suffix.description: Additional output populated by modules, intended to be displayed after the main title tag that appears in the template.

dom_id.name: Dom ID
dom_id.description: Unique id for every view being printed to give unique class for Javascript.
